sql.if: and board_title like concat('%',#{pagevo.searchKeyword},'%') or board_content like concat('%',#{pagevo.searchKeyword},'%') or board_user_id like concat('%',#{pagevo.searchKeyword},'%')

mapper.insert: insert into testboard (board_sequence, board_user_id, board_category, board_title, board_content, board_viewcount,board_date,board_goodcount) values(nextval(board_sequence),#{board_user_id},#{board_category},#{board_title},#{board_content},default,default,default)
mapper.select: select tb.* from (select *, ROW_NUMBER() over (order by board_date desc, board_viewcount desc, board_date desc) as rnum from testboard ) tb where rnum between #{startNo} and #{endNo};
select count(*) from testboard where board_category=#{category}
mapper.update: update testboard set board_category=#{board_category}, board_title=#{board_title},board_content=#{board_content} where board_sequence=#{board_sequence}
update testboard set board_viewcount=#{board_viewcount} where board_sequence=#{board_sequence}
mapper.select: select count(*) from boardlike where board_user_id=#{board_user_id} and board_sequence=#{board_sequence}
mapper.update: update testboard set board_goodcount=board_goodcount-1 where board_sequence=#{board_sequence}
update testboard set board_goodcount=board_goodcount+1 where board_sequence=#{board_sequence}
mapper.delete: delete from boardlike where board_sequence=#{board_sequence} and board_user_id=#{board_user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from boardlike where board_sequence=#{board_sequence}
